00030 SelectItemTypeDialog::SelectItemTypeDialog(QWidget* parent,
00031                                            unsigned int allowedItems) : QDialog(parent),
00032                                                                         allowedItems_(allowedItems),
00033                                                                         layout_(0), allowedItemsGroup_(0)
00034 {
00035     Q_ASSERT(allowedItems != CIT_NONE);
00036 
00037     setWindowTitle(tr("Add Item"));
00038 
00039     layout_ = new QGridLayout(this);
00040 
00041     // Create the radio button group and a layout for it.
00042     allowedItemsGroup_ = new QGroupBox(tr("Item Type"), this);
00043     QGridLayout* itemLayout = new QGridLayout(allowedItemsGroup_);
00044 
00045     //bool found = false;
00046     
00047     // Create the item radio buttons.
00048     if (allowedItems & CIT_INTERFACE)
00049     {
00050         itemRadioButtons_[0] = new QRadioButton("Interface", allowedItemsGroup_);
00051         itemRadioButtons_[0]->setChecked(true);
00052         itemLayout->addWidget(itemRadioButtons_[0], 0, 0, 1, 1);
00053     }
00054 
00055     QString text = "";
00056 
00057     if (allowedItems & CIT_COMPONENT)
00058     {
00059         text += "Component/";
00060     }
00061     
00062     if (allowedItems & CIT_CHANNEL)
00063     {
00064         text += "Channel/";
00065     }
00066 
00067     if (allowedItems & CIT_BRIDGE)
00068     {
00069         text += "Bridge/";
00070     }
00071 
00072     text = text.left(text.length() - 1);
00073 
00074     if (!text.isEmpty())
00075     {
00076         itemRadioButtons_[1] = new QRadioButton(text, allowedItemsGroup_);
00077         itemLayout->addWidget(itemRadioButtons_[1], 1, 0, 1, 1);
00078     }
00079 
00080     /*for (unsigned int i = 0; i < CIT_COUNT; ++i)
00081     {

00084 
00085         if (allowedItems & type)
00086         {
00087             itemRadioButtons_[i] = new QRadioButton(ITEM_NAMES[i], allowedItemsGroup_);

00089

00093                 itemRadioButtons_[i]->setChecked(true);

00095             }
00096         }

00100         }
00101     }*/
00102 
00103     layout_->addWidget(allowedItemsGroup_, 0, 0, 1, 2);
00104 
00105     // Create the OK and Cancel buttons.
00106     QPushButton* btnOK = new QPushButton(this);
00107     btnOK->setText(tr("&Add"));
00108     layout_->addWidget(btnOK, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00109 
00110     QPushButton* btnCancel = new QPushButton(this);
00111     btnCancel->setText(tr("&Cancel"));
00112     layout_->addWidget(btnCancel, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00113 
00114     // Connect the button signals to accept() and reject().
00115     QObject::connect(btnOK, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00116     QObject::connect(btnCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject()));
00117 }

00127 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 // Function: getSelectedItemType()
00129 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 ColumnItemType SelectItemTypeDialog::getSelectedItemType() const
00131 {
00132     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < CIT_COUNT; ++i)
00133     {
00134         if (itemRadioButtons_[i] != 0 && itemRadioButtons_[i]->isChecked())
00135         {
00136             return static_cast<ColumnItemType>(1 << i);
00137         }
00138     }
00139 
00140     // We should not get here at all.
00141     Q_ASSERT(false);
00142     return CIT_NONE;
00143 }
